name: Landfill
overview: Landfill is written in C and features music from EAB's very own saimon69. Landfill is a little like Tetris or Columns but with its own unique gameplay. Here, you have a chain of household items. You remove items by matching them with the next item in the chain. As the game progresses, new items appear and it becomes a rapid memory game. You can use the fire button to swap with items to the left or right.
